ThingDef.label: persona 余辉重型火箭炮
ThingDef.description: 余晖子公司出产的一种基本型武器，性能出众，对建筑物的破坏效果尤其出色，它也因此成为了余晖公司的拳头产品，远销多星。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 孤鹜霰弹枪
ThingDef.description: 仅在集团内部才能见到的先进武器，作为一把能一次发射大量高能等离子体的先进霰弹枪，高昂的造价和大量恒星物质的使用完全配得上它。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 孤鹜等离子抛射器
ThingDef.description: 在燃料喷火器的基础上，残阳的科学家们研发出了新一代等离子抛射器，空气经过强电流激发后，会成为一种浓度低一些的等离子体，可以在较远的距离对建筑点火，简单的结构和材料需求也使等离子喷射器造价低廉，可以用于武装精英部队。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 黄昏等离子步枪
ThingDef.description: ”黄昏“先进武器计划的一部分，枪内安装的恒星物质增幅线圈可以更有效的激发等离子，从而使发射的等离子团获得不可思议的能量。遗憾的是，除开恒星物质带来的高昂造价，其对护甲的低伤害也是单兵等离子武器的普遍缺点。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 黄昏等离子机炮
ThingDef.description: ”黄昏“先进武器计划的一部分，机炮内装备了相对较大的充能线圈，从而抛射出更大质量，且能造成小范围燃烧的等离子团，不过射程和穿甲率也随之减小。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 落霞狙击枪
ThingDef.description: “落霞”合作项目的最终成果，帝国的多层串列式线圈技术与集团自研的高性能飞镖弹使其拥有了不可思议的精度和穿甲性能。注意，帝国会向生产的每一把枪收取资源作为专利授权费，导致造价也非常不可思议。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 落霞穿甲机枪
ThingDef.description: 落霞项目的衍生品，为保证散热缩减了加速线圈的长度后，射程有所降低，但穿甲性能依然超出普通机枪，同时，机枪的射速也令重甲敌人闻风丧胆。它的造价比普通机枪略高，但仍在正常范围内。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona “凤凰”单兵动能弹
ThingDef.description:
这种奇特的实验型武器整体由纳米机器构成，由单兵架设后，内置的高性能推进器会将整颗弹体发射岀去，并用超高速度带来的动能进行杀伤，在此之后，纳米机器会自行重组成一颗新弹体，但有时纳米机器会因动能过大而直接报废，其飞行会时摩擦空气发出明亮的火光，“凤凰”也因此得名。
“涅槃需先浴火”

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 暮色陨星炮
ThingDef.description: 残阳公司出产的特种武器，因其巨大威力被列入限制授权名单，这种武器的弹头由一发先导破障弹头和一发基于恒星物质的次世代弹头组成，在接触地面后，破障弹头会先产生一次小型爆炸，清除周围的障碍物，随后主弹头起爆，产生的冲击波会将杀伤范围内的一切蒸发。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 暮色千阳炮
ThingDef.description:
一款只有集团高级客户才能获得制造授权的的先进武器，装载压缩铝热剂弹头的的集束发射器可以一次发射五十发超高温燃烧弹，造成的伤害甚至不低于一般的等离子武器，用后即弃。
“百日同辉，大羿叹息”

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 赤云破甲榴弹发射器（高爆）
ThingDef.description: 作为集团早期对恒星物质的武器化尝试，在聚能药罩中掺入的的少量恒星物质极大提升了金属射流的穿深，让大部分装甲可以被轻松击穿，少量的其他物质让弹头极易产生爆炸，同时由于其专利过期且造价低廉，在各种战场上都能看见它的身影。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.label: persona 赤云破甲榴弹发射器（脉冲）
ThingDef.description: 作为集团早期对恒星物质的武器化尝试，在聚能药罩中掺入的的少量恒星物质极大提升了金属射流的穿深，让大部分装甲可以被轻松击穿，少量的其他物质让弹头极易产生电磁脉冲，同时由于其专利过期且造价低廉，在各种战场上都能看见它的身影。\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
